ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] A run of luck
ygData.msgSnippet: The serpentine is steel plate look.  As for the Black Chitin Legs just go camp em, geez.  Most nights I am in Sol B it is either at the Sol A bug-line, Death
ygData.messageBody:
The serpentine is steel plate look. As for the Black Chitin Legs just go
camp em, geez. Most nights I am in Sol B it is either at the Sol A
bug-line, Death Beetle or Stone Spider Room. The DB drops the legs pretty
regularly. On karana the Legs sell for 1k plat.

Rokenn

-----Original Message-----
From: Ryan Honeyman [mailto:honeyman@...]
Sent: Monday, March 20, 2000 12:23 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] A run of luck


From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>

> Head: Executioner Hood (want to replace this with a Froglock or Trannix
> crown)

You should get an Opoline helm, hehe.

> Chest: Enamalled Black chestplate
> Legs: Black Chitin Legs

I should buy a BE chestplate, and ditch the charred bp.
As far as the legs go they are typically classified as a caster
item, and I wouldn't ever earn these - need to buy these as well
or convince some friends to camp bugs for a night.

> Arms: Blacked Iron Armplates (back chain, no black plate arms exist for
> non-Sks AFAIK)

Yeah I don't think there are any for non-sk's either.

> Wrist: Serpentine Bracer, it kind of spoils the look. I need to get a
> granite bracer (off Petrifin, a spawn in Rathe Mtns. I hate camping Rathe
> Mtn rares).

Yeah but what color is it? hehe.

Harmonic.
